verses.text: The \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w messenger|strong="G0032"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w prepare|strong="G2680"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

The \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of one \w crying|strong="G0994"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*, Prepare \w ye|strong="G2090"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w paths|strong="G5147"\w* \w straight|strong="G2117"\w*.

\w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w did|strong="G1096"\w* \w baptize|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w remission|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there went \w out|strong="G1607"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w land|strong="G5561"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they of \w Jerusalem|strong="G2415"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G0907"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w river|strong="G4215"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w confessing|strong="G1843"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* clothed \w with|strong="G1746"\w* \w camel’s|strong="G2574"\w* \w hair|strong="G2359"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* with a \w girdle|strong="G2223"\w* of a \w skin|strong="G1193"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w loins|strong="G3751"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he did \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w locusts|strong="G0200"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wild|strong="G0066"\w* \w honey|strong="G3192"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, There \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* one mightier \w than|strong="G2478"\w* \w I|strong="G3450"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w*, the \w latchet|strong="G2438"\w* of \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w shoes|strong="G5266"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G2425"\w* \w to|strong="G3089"\w* stoop \w down|strong="G2955"\w* and \w unloose|strong="G3089"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* have \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w baptize|strong="G0907"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, that \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* coming \w up|strong="G0305"\w* out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w opened|strong="G4977"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* a \w dove|strong="G4058"\w* \w descending|strong="G2597"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G1096"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I am well \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2117"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w driveth|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the wild \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* that \w John|strong="G2491"\w* was put in \w prison|strong="G3860"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2784"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w The time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w is fulfilled|strong="G4137"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w is at hand|strong="G1448"\+w*: \+w repent ye|strong="G3340"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w the gospel|strong="G2098"\+w*.\wj*

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* as he \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w casting|strong="G0906"\w* a \w net|strong="G0293"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w fishers|strong="G0231"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Come ye|strong="G1205"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3694"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I will make|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w to become|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w fishers|strong="G0231"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* they \w forsook|strong="G0863"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w nets|strong="G1350"\w*, and \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w gone|strong="G4260"\w* a little \w further|strong="G3641"\w* \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* the \add son\add* of \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w who|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w mending|strong="G2675"\w* their \w nets|strong="G1350"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* he \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the hired \w servants|strong="G3411"\w*, and \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w went|strong="G1531"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* on the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w* he \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, and \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2258"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* one that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* an \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he cried \w out|strong="G0349"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Let|strong="G1436"\w* \add us\add* \w alone|strong="G1436"\w*; what \w have|strong="G5101"\w* we to \w do|strong="G2254"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, thou \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3479"\w*? art thou \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*? I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w*, the Holy \w One|strong="G0040"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Hold thy peace|strong="G5392"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G4682"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* had \w torn|strong="G4682"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, he came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G2284"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w amazed|strong="G2284"\w*, insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they \w questioned|strong="G4802"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* thing \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*? \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* \add is\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*? \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w with|strong="G2596"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* commandeth \w he|strong="G2004"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they do \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2117"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w fame|strong="G0189"\w* spread \w abroad|strong="G1831"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the region round \w about|strong="G4066"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2112"\w*, when they were come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, they \w entered|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Simon’s|strong="G4613"\w* \w wife’s mother|strong="G3994"\w* \w lay|strong="G2621"\w* sick of a \w fever|strong="G4445"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anon|strong="G2112"\w* they \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w took|strong="G2902"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and \w lifted|strong="G1453"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* the \w fever|strong="G4446"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* at \w even|strong="G3798"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w did|strong="G1096"\w* \w set|strong="G1416"\w*, they \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w were|strong="G2192"\w* \w diseased|strong="G2560"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that were possessed with \w devils|strong="G1139"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* gathered \w together|strong="G1996"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* that \w were|strong="G2192"\w* \w sick|strong="G2560"\w* of \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w diseases|strong="G3554"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffered|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w devils|strong="G1140"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w morning|strong="G4404"\w*, rising \w up|strong="G0450"\w* a great \w while|strong="G3029"\w* before \w day|strong="G1773"\w*, he went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w solitary|strong="G2048"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, and \w there|strong="G2546"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* followed \w after|strong="G2614"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* seek \w for|strong="G2212"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Let us go|strong="G0071"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the next|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w towns|strong="G2969"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w I may preach|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w there also|strong="G2546"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w came I forth|strong="G1831"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2258"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* a \w leper|strong="G3015"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w beseeching|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* kneeling \w down|strong="G1120"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w wilt|strong="G2309"\w*, thou canst \w make|strong="G1410"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w clean|strong="G2511"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, moved with \w compassion|strong="G4697"\w*, put \w forth|strong="G1614"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I will|strong="G2309"\+w*; \+w be thou clean|strong="G2511"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* as soon \w as|strong="G2036"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* the \w leprosy|strong="G3014"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w cleansed|strong="G2511"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he straitly \w charged|strong="G1690"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1690"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2112"\w* \w sent|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G1544"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w See|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w thou say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w to any man|strong="G3367"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w shew|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G4572"\+w* \+w to the priest|strong="G2409"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w offer|strong="G4374"\+w* \+w for|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w cleansing|strong="G2512"\+w* \+w those things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w commanded|strong="G4367"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a testimony|strong="G3142"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*
